name: Seal of the Pact: Genie Magic

system.description:
You can draw upon the magic of genies. Choose the type of genie you draw your power from and associated damage type: Div (bludgeoning), Djinn (lightning), Efreet (fire), or Marid (cold).

  • At 1st level you learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.kaye34nheyrit487]{Detect Magic} spell
  • At 3rd level you learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.yav7747ibqje7nzm]{Alter Self} spell
  • At 5th level you learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.ef9fuzf8xcja2p7c]{Tongues} spell
  • At 9th level you learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.v14gdz7j6rr1cr4h]{Creation} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.633bpp281x35cz6t]{Conjure Elemental} spells, the latter of which can only summon elementals of the same element and the genie type you chose.

These spells do not count against your maximum spells known.
